page.title: 12TRADE LOCAL SHOPS MARKET
page.content: In{Ferndown}there are five{newsagents and three{supermarkets}- Safeway, International and Kwiksave. Very soon there will be a large{Tesco.}There are six estate agents and two sports shops. In Victoria Road, the main shopping road, there are also many non-food shops, which sell anything from furniture to holidays.{Service {shops}include dry cleaners, hair- dressers and a funeral director. Car parking for shoppers has much improved with the addition of two{car parks, one open and one multi-storey. On Thursdays there is a small{market.} At the crossroads a new row of shops has been built and some are already occupied. There are two{garages}in Ferndown which have workshops as well as forecourt petrol sales. There are three banks and seven building society offices or agents.
